questions.question: What library builds user interfaces with components?
questions.explanation: React creates UIs using reusable components.

questions.question: What framework provides a complete development platform?
questions.explanation: Angular offers comprehensive tools for web development.

questions.question: What progressive framework is easy to learn?
questions.explanation: Vue has a gentle learning curve.

questions.question: What syntax embeds HTML in JavaScript?
What Angular feature binds data bidirectionally?
What Vue property passes data to child components?
questions.explanation: Props pass data from parent to child.

questions.question: What compiler transpiles modern JavaScript?
questions.explanation: Babel converts ES6+ to compatible JavaScript.

questions.question: What framework compiles to vanilla JavaScript?
questions.explanation: Svelte compiles components at build time.
